title: Can't find help at all with this awful support system, need to send info about player threats.
body: Cannot figure out how to use the support system at all. Just played a game with my wife and had an incredibly salty player "looking up personal info" and threatening "say goodnight to your internet", among other things. I take crap like that seriously but of course riot just wants to make everything as un-user friendly as possible. Anyone able to sort this out?

replies.body:
As *Wolfess* mentioned, you can report a player in the post-game lobby if you feel they're doing something to break the [summoner's code](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/get-started/summoners-code/) or personally threatening you. You can find our guide on reporting a player [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player)

Additionally, if the incident happens outside of a match or post-game lobby, such as in chat, you can report them by [submitting a support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.

I'm not sure how un-user friendly you can get when the report button can be found in the post-game lobby, it's the red buttons with "!" marks on them next to each player on the upper-right hand portion of the lobby.
